course.title: MAT 5170 Probability Theory I (3 units)
course.desc: Probability spaces, random variables, expected values as integrals, joint distributions, independence and product measures, cumulative distribution functions and extensions of probability measures, Borel- Cantelli lemmas, convergence concepts, independent identically distributed sequences of random variables. This course is equivalent to STAT 5708 at Carleton University.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 3125 and MAT 3172 (MATH 3001, MATH 3002 and MATH 3500).
